title: 5 Types of Dickheads You Might Stumble Across [Australian and Oceania Edition]
body:
Hello, Players.
In this post I'am going to carefully address the types of players you may meet while playing on the rift, These are only the ones i've encountered. Please feel free to correct me if i'm wrong and add the ones you think should be on the list.

1. **_"The Bogan Gamer" _**
This Type player is kind of rare to meet but you will stumble across some if you play on Oceania, He spits flame almost whenever someone makes a mistake and will blame the team if he dies, If you talk back, He will start to spit out so much crap at you that. And if you call him a bogan he will start making racist remarks at you; Example below:
[Best Teemo OCE]: Shut up u f#ken bogan.
[MCmaddogJason01]: GO F#CK YOURSELF YOU "[Nationality Insert Here]" F#CKWIT C#NT, SUCK A D#CK, I BANGED YOUR MUM LAST NIGHT.
Note: The truth was [Best Teemo OCE] wasn't that specific nationality and MCmaddogJason01 didn't bang his Mum.

2. "_**The Secretly Angry on the inside but isn't showing it in game"**_
If you are arguing with this type of person, He will add smiley faces to try to tell the other person his not angry but inside he is furious and wants to stab a b#tch, it mostly goes like this;
[Sh4Dowblazt8]: bro shut up you f#ggot...
[WayneLOL]: Make me :)
[Sh4Dowblazt8]: dude, seriously stop being a dickheadd...
[WayneLOL]: IRL i would f#ck you up kid so backoff while you can :)

3. _**The "%%%gotRetardtron1000**_"
He instalocks withoud picking a lane, Nek minet he calls midlane although its already called, starts game goes mid and feeds, Starts blaming other people of how bad they are and how he wasn't trying and shit.

4. "_**The self declared LOL god that writes /all chat because he wants the other team to know that his team sucks and how he is a god**_"
He writes /all chats to let everyone know how useless his own team is and how he is a god, He also starts off by saying "Report [Player]" at the start if he isn't satisfied with your work, Arguing with him is a pain and just use mute because its endless.

5. **_The Grammar police/Smartass_**;
This is so common, If you argue with him, he wil try te rek yu liek thers no tomorrw. He is so retarded he corrects you on everything, Example below;
[eZmegatRonyez]: shuttup u %%%ott, no one wants to hear ur shet...
[SofisticatedPotato]: You*, Talk to me when you learn how to spell kid.
[eZmegatRonyez]: go fk urself fking retrd
[SofisticatedPotato: Yourself*, I physically cannot fuckk myself, but i did bang your mum last night kid :).

_**DISCLAIMER: ALL NAMES ARE MADEUP ON THE SPOT AND THIS MAY NOT ALWAYS BE TRUE, THERE ARE MORE TO THE LIST BUT I WOULD'NT BE BOTHERED TO WRITE THEM ALL BECAUSE IT WOULD BE TOO TIME CONSUMING, PLZ ADD YOURS ASWELL AND CORRECT THESE AS THEY ARE NOT PERFECTLY MATCHED, THESE ARE JUST SOME OF THE ONES I HATE THE MOST SO YEAH THANK 4 READING AND REMEMBER TO STAY MOIST :D.
**_

replies.body: Not gonna lie, I'm any and all of these things if the wrong guy decides to piss me off.
im the sup instalocker god of oce all will suffer for im the one that instalocks garen sup every fucken game git gud or  git retk noobz
I laughed so hard at this, especially when I realized that the Grammar/Spelling Nazi name was spelt wrong :')

Meanwhile riot still gives 0 shits!

AND NEVER WILL!

OCE home of trolls, afkers, ragers, retards, feeders, etc

Excuse me you have forgotten the Chinese International Student, their name is usually Chinese, they have a tendency to play Pantheon, Yi, Xin Zhao, Twisted Fate, etc.. They are unable to grasp basic English, start blaming the whole team after they make a mistake. There are different variations of these people, such as threatening to afk, saying 'fxck your mum', feeding intentionally and tilting everyone with their toxicity. These people are quite common in the Platinum Rank, however not all chinese international students are like this. Just some.

6. **_The 'Diamond' Smurf_**
Says they are a diamond smurf and say they'll carry if they get the lane they want. When they win, they tend to boost their ego up by saying something to the likes of:
"See, I carried."
But on the other hand, if they lose, they say something to the likes of this:
"WOW THIS **** TEAM LEARN TO PLAY!!!"
And rage non-stop.
